channel.title: Requesting Title Screen Error
channel.description:
Hello community of MoparScape! :D I have scavenged many forums looking for answers and have not found one quite specific enough for my needs, I am hoping that this thread will bring the answers to me.
I do much more webcoding then Java coding and tried making a webclient for the server I'm currently making. I have a webhost and I have uploaded both the jar file created with "JAR Maker" and the cache to my webhost, however whenever I attempt to access the game through my webclient I get a "Requesting Title Screen - Connection Error retrying in...." Error and for the life of me can not find out what the problem is.
Any and all help is greatly appreciated!
All the best CodySP

item.title: Requesting Title Screen Error

Bumped. I think my files were just stolen x)

Why not just upload them and give them to me? Just client.java, CacheDownloader.java, and signlink.java.

item.title: Requesting Title Screen Error
item.dc:creator: @CodySP CodySP
item.description:
@CodySP wrote:

itai:

Link me to your client java files for webclient, only the java files

I may have missed a step, because I don’t have any link to give you, please forgive me as I am incredibly new. I have the Cache, and a Client.jar uploaded, along with the rest of my website files. :S

Read full topic

Hello community of MoparScape! I have scavenged many forums looking for answers and have not found one quite specific enough for my needs, I am hoping that this thread will bring the answers to me.

I do much more webcoding then Java coding and tried making a webclient for the server I’m currently making.
